text: Bachia scaea is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Bachia Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 2013 Category:Taxa named by Mauro Teixeira Jr. Category:Taxa named by Francisco Dal Vechio Category:Taxa named by Pedro M. Sales-Nunes Category:Taxa named by Antonio Mollo Neto Category:Taxa named by Luciana Moreira Lobo Category:Taxa named by Luis Fernando Storti Category:Taxa named by Renato Augusto Junqueira Gaiga Category:Taxa named by Pedro Henrique Freire Dias Category:Taxa named by Miguel Trefaut Rodrigues
title: Bachia scaea
